title: Fix search link on http://lucene.apache.org/
description:
The current link to http://search-lucene.com is
http://search-lucene.com/lucene?q=apache&searchProvider=sl
http://search-lucene.com/solr?q=apache

The project names  should be upcase
http://search-lucene.com/Lucene?q=apache&searchProvider=sl
http://search-lucene.com/Solr?q=apache

comments.content: The project names may be lower case, but it doesn't appear to be causing any problems (perhaps it did in the past, but it's not now). Resolving as Can't Reproduce.
comments.author: Cassandra Targett
